overview:
Curtis Clave received a B.S. in Interactive Media Design from the Art Institute of San Diego. His passion for innovative design and researching new technologies resulted in him starting Clave Media. Specializing in web design and development Clave Media places a strong emphasis on quality customer care and satisfaction. Curtis has worked on strategic web design for a wide spectrum of clientele from local businesses to international brands, making sure each client received ROI.

An avid traveler and entrepreneur, Curtis is responsible for the creation of several businesses and implements his worldly experience into projects, providing them with a unique style and feel. His unique ability to merge technical skills in web development and marketing has helped build a strong foundation of web expertise with his new venture SOI|CLAVE.
